name: Verbophobia
description:
In the spirit of Halloween, you play as a Vampire. The catch is that you can't jump! In the first level, the long fall breaks your teeth. Collect the hidden blood bag in each level in order to unlock the final level (4).

Move left and right using A and D or the left and right arrow keys. Press the spacebar in order to jump turn into a bat. Each level introduces a new obstacle to overcome.

Total development time: 30 hours
